nodes.text: Tanquilla Beach was a shadowport with an outlaw garage. The former pirate Queen Maz Kanata marked it down as an outlaw garage on a map she included in the book that would later become known as the Smuggler's Guide. When the book came into the possession of the smuggler Platt Okeefe, she added that it was also a good shadowport and bolt-hole for smugglers.

Tanquilla Beach was first mentioned in the current canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace. It originated in The DarkStryder Campaign, a 1995 Star Wars Legends supplement for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
